column2: title=The Art of Ruth Lacon: Illustrations inspired by the works of JRR Tolkien

column1: '''''The Art of Ruth Lacon: Illustrations inspired by the works of JRR Tolkien''''' is an art book which collects illustrations made by [[Ruth Lacon]]. The book includes commments on the pieces of art, and a detailed biography on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], and Ruth Lacon. Only 1000 copies were published.

A beautiful book covering Ruthâ€™s variety of media and styles. The illustrations range from black & white pen & ink to full colour, very bright, with much attention to details and borders, and covers the whole Tolkien spectrum from Lord of the Rings through Hobbit to Silmarillion, Unfinished Tales & Farmer Giles.
